name: Pineapple Pound Cake
author: Evelyn Ivy
summary: A pound cake made with pineapple and glazed with pineapple sauce. Unlike most cakes, you will not preheat the oven on this one.
ingredients: ¾ cup crushed pineapple with juice
directions: Grease and flour a 10 inch tube pan
Sift together the flour, and baking powder
In a large bowl, cream together the shortening, 1 cup butter and sugar until light and fluffy
Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla
Add the flour mixture alternately with milk; beat well
Stir in the 3/4 cup crushed pineapple
Turn oven to 325 degrees F (175 degrees C) and bake for 90 minutes or until top springs back when touched
Remove from oven and let stand for 10 minutes
To make the glaze:  In a small saucepan, combine 1/4 cup butter, confectioners sugar and 1 cup crushed pineapple
Pour over cake as soon as it comes out of the pan
